body_html:
More particularly, aforementioned messages occur when I tried steps as official website, i.e.:
git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
git submodule update --init --recursive
python setup.py install

After these steps, except for opencv, I can use caffe2's other function.
(r21d) xiongcx@ASUS-03:~$ cd ~ && python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
Success

Because I can't use caffe2 with opencv, then I tried other install steps as follows:
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
cd pytorch && git submodule update --init
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
export DESTDIR="$HOME" && make -j20 install
After these steps, the cmake summary indicates "USE_OPENCV: ON", but the installation of caffe2 failed.
(r21d) xiongcx@ASUS-03:~$ cd ~ && python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
Failure
Segmentation fault (core dumped)

I have tried all the methods I can think of. Any suggestions?

body:
More particularly, aforementioned messages occur when I tried steps as official website, i.e.:
git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
git submodule update --init --recursive
python setup.py install

After these steps, except for opencv, I can use caffe2's other function.
(r21d) xiongcx@ASUS-03:~$ cd ~ && python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
Success

Because I can't use caffe2 with opencv, then I tried other install steps as follows:
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
cd pytorch && git submodule update --init
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
export DESTDIR="$HOME" && make -j20 install
After these steps, the cmake summary indicates "USE_OPENCV: ON", but the installation of caffe2 failed.
(r21d) xiongcx@ASUS-03:~$ cd ~ && python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
Failure
Segmentation fault (core dumped)

I have tried all the methods I can think of. Any suggestions?
